description: Love buys hamburgers at the shop where her mother works. After Love finishes cooking the hamburgers disappear due to Souler`s Nakewameke. Later on, the same Nakewameke erases the Cures` mothers, and it is up to the Cures to finish off the Nakewameke.

titles.title: Kieta Hamburger! Daisuki na Mono o Mamore!!
The Missing Hamburger! Protect Your Favourite Things!!
消えたハンバーグ! 大好きなものを守れ!!
